ygData.subject: RE: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the week to play: Everyday :) Time of day: 12am - 6am, low competittion on server, and low lag
ygData.messageBody:
When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play:
Everyday :)

Time of day:
12am - 6am, low competittion on server, and low lag for twisting songs.

Longest stretch of continuous play:
17 hours last saturday. I did stop to take a quick shower (but did not log
off) for 15 minutes. Btw, I did not gain any experience that day. Was
tracking down quests and exploring.

Way to have game sounds: Sound realism all the way up Sterio. Music at 3/4.
Unless im in Aviak Village or Happytown.. er Rivervale. Then turn the music
all the way down :)

Distance to sit from display:
36-48 inches

TV show to have on:
TV is evil. But I do listen to DVD movies: Lately my favorite has been "So
I Married an Axe Murderer"

Music to listen to:
Anything but the Rivervale song.

Beverage (non-alcoholic):
Diet Coke

Beverage (alcoholic):
Michalob Amber Boch

Health Food:
Water

Junk Food:
KFC, but only when fighting Aviaks

Clothes to wear:
I dress up like my character.. Just kidding:) Jeans and T shirt.

My answers...

Day of the week to play: long Weekends

Time of day: 8pm to 6am Central time

Longest stretch of continuous play: 30 hours

Way to have game sounds: Dolby Surround (but have to go to head phones a
lot)

Distance to sit from display: up real close

TV show to have on: The Weather Channel

Music to listen to: Rivervale Happy music or Aviak TreeHouse Theme

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Iced tea

Beverage (alcoholic): Vodka Martini

Health Food: n/a

Junk Food: jerkey - beef or turkey

Clothes to wear: Hawaiian shirt & Bermuda shorts
